text: Observability has now become table stakes.

We have focused in the last eight years
on reliability and resiliency,
but with observability

where we can actually predict incidents
that are happening with predictive

analytics, do a ton 
better event correlation

when we see something
that looks a little bit weird over here

and correlated to this thing
that's happening.

One of the things that we're partnering
with AWS on is our observability program.

Running a complex operation,
which if you think about the

employees that
we have that we need

to enable with the right technology
to deliver for our customers.

Which we fly millions and millions
every year, over 3,000 destinations a day.

And so it's time to bring it
to the next level

To be able to bring those things 
together and predict that

will not only drive reliability

at the end of the day,

the better
